author: cnbc.com
title: Kevin M. Kuznicki Named Jason’s General Counsel
text:
MILWAUKEE, April 04, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Jason Industries, Inc. (NASDAQ:JASN) (NASDAQ:JASNW) (the “Company” or “Jason”) welcomes Kevin M. Kuznicki as General Counsel.
Jason Industries, Inc. General Counsel Kevin Kuznicki
“Kevin’s global and local corporate legal experience and track record supporting diverse markets and managing international legal teams will be helpful to Jason as we continue to expand and solidify our presence in new and existing markets,” said Brian Kobylinski, CEO.
Kuznicki’s experience includes a series of domestic and international roles with Adient plc/Johnson Controls International plc, most recently serving as VP & Deputy General Counsel of Adient, the public spin-off of the automotive business unit, managing a team in Wisconsin, Michigan, Brazil, Germany and China. He earned his Juris Doctorate and BA in Political Science and studies in Business from Indiana University, Bloomington.
Said Kuznicki, “I’m thrilled for the opportunity to work with Jason's global team as well as the chance to apply my international legal and leadership experience to Jason's diverse manufacturing companies.”
About Jason Industries, Inc.
The Company is the parent company to a global family of manufacturing leaders within the finishing, components, seating, and acoustics markets, including Osborn (Richmond, Ind. and Burgwald, Germany), Metalex (Libertyville, Ill.), Milsco (Milwaukee, Wis.), and Janesville Acoustics (Southfield, Mich.). Headquartered in Milwaukee, Wis., Jason employs more than 4,400 people in 14 countries.
